subject: Steroids
Baseball
lead_paragraph: Brian McNamee may sue Roger Clemens if the pitcher says on “60 Minutes” that McNamee was not being truthful when he said he injected Clemens with performance-enhancing drugs.
snippet: Brian McNamee may sue Roger Clemens if the pitcher says on “60 Minutes” that McNamee was not being truthful when he said he injected Clemens with performance-enhancing drugs.
